channel.title: How to add the working ring of wealth into game
channel.description: The item is already in the files I was just wondering how to go about editing it's special and what would it look like. Maybe even knowing where it should be located I could find the ring of recoil and go from there. And also I know full construction is a rather long and drawn out process and for now i just have a planking system in game I would like to know where to start with in the actual coding portion of construction. I know the dialogue among other things outside the actual skill would have to change I'm just wondering as far as new files what would have to be added.

item.title: How to add the working ring of wealth into game
item.dc:creator: @suseto suseto
item.description:
@suseto wrote:

So the effect of the ring doesn’t need to be added into the files. That was my question sorry if i made it seem like it was something else.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add the working ring of wealth into game

item.title: How to add the working ring of wealth into game
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You can find how the ring of wealth works on the rs wiki. So you would just code it into your dropping method then.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add the working ring of wealth into game
